name: Snail Crossing: Lucky Lefty Lives?!
description:
The land is being invaded by colonizers! You are under attack! Help Lucky Lefty Live!

Controls:
Down Arrow to hold onto rock when colonizers try to knock you off with a shovel.
Right Arrow to shoot love darts when colonizers try to sit on you.
Up Arrow to call in a wasp attack to fend off colonizers trying to capture you.
Space bar to restart.
